title: Simply Block Survival
description: This simple survival pack has basic weaponry, tree variations, log cabins and texture variations allowing for multiple color variations.
longDescription:
This pack contains modular cabin buildings, modular environment flooring and walls. it also has props and environment assets to create a block style survival game.

 

Asset Turntable Video Here


◼ Key Features ◼


- Texture variations on all items allowing multiple colours to suit your needs!

- Multiple trees with different stages

- Modular design

- Basic water material


 


◼ Assets ◼


47 Building Parts 

Log Cabin Platform (4 Variations), Log Cabin Stairs (4 Variations), Cliff Wall, Cliff 90, Cliff Outer 90, Cave wall, Cliff Cave entrance, Cliff Cave entrance frame, Log Cabin wall (4 Variations), Log Cabin Door Frame (4 Variations), Log Cabin Pillar (4 Variations), Log Cabin Pillar small (4 Variations), Log Cabin Roof (4 Variations), Log Cabin Roof Pillar(4 Variations), Log Cabin wall roof(4 Variations), Log Cabin Window frame (4 Variations), Cliff Pillar


56 Floors

Pond 90, Pond Straight, Pond Outer 90, Dirt (10 Variations), Grass (10 Variations), Rock (10 Variations), Sand (10 Variations), Dirt Slant (3 Variations), Grass Slant (3 Variations), Rock Slant (3 Variations), Sand Slant (3 Variations), Water Plane


150 Props

Delivery Base, Delivery Falling, Delivery Landed, Delivery Parachute, Delivery Rope, FirePit, Firepit Hangers, Firepit handle, Foliage ( 8 Variations ), Grass ( 6 Variations ), Handle Wrap, Lighter 1, Lighter 2, Log, Rock ( 3 Variations ), Rocks ( 2 Variations) , Shelter, Shelter covered, Sleeping Bag (12 Variations), Stick, Stick combined, Tarpaulin, Tarpaulin Folded, Axe ( 2 Variations), Binoculars Open, Binoculars Closed, Compass Arm, Compass Base, Fire Tool Board, Fire Tool Bow, Fire Tool Spindle, Fishing Reel Bail, Fishing Reel Base, Fishing Reel Combined, Fishing Reel Drag, Fishing Reel Handle, Fishing Reel Line, Fishing Reel Spool, Fishing Rod, Fishing Rod Line, Flashlight ( 8 Variations), Knife ( 2 Variations) Sat Phone, Shovel (2 Variations), Torch ( 2 Variations), Water Bottle, Water Bottle 2, Water Can, Birch ( 4 Variations), Oak ( 4 Variations), Pine ( 4 Variations), Palm Tree, Poplar ( 4 Variations), Redwood ( 4 Variations), Spruce ( 4 Variations), Willow ( 5 Variations), Blowgun ( 2 Variations), Club (2 Variations), Machete ( 2 Variations), Speak (2 Variations), Stick (2 Variations), Cloud (3 Variations), God Ray, dropped leaf, Flare Gun, Flare Gun Ammo, Flare Gun Ammo Cartridge, Flare Gun Ammo Cartridge Empty, Glow Stick, Lilly Pad, Pelican Case Bottom, Pelican Case Top, Pelican Case Combined, Plastic Container, Plastic Container Large, Reeds ( 4 Variations ), Wooden Mallet ( 2 Variations ), Purifier Built, Purifier Table, Tactical Knife Closed, Tactical Knife Open, Tactical Knife Upgraded


2 FX

FirePit, FireTorch
technicalDetails:
Number of Unique Meshes: 256

Collision: Yes - Auto

LODs: Yes - Auto

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 10

Number of Textures: 7

Texture Resolutions: 1024

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
